00044 template <typename T> class MutexInterface
00045 {
00046 public:
00048     MutexInterface()
00049     {
00050 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00051         dbg_printf("Creating a mutex\n");
00052 #endif
00053 
00054     }
00055 
00057     virtual ~MutexInterface()
00058     {
00059 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00060         dbg_printf("Destroying a mutex\n");
00061 #endif
00062 
00063     }
00064 
00069     virtual bool lock() = 0;
00070 
00075     virtual bool unlock() = 0;
00076 
00083     T& getNative()
00084     {
00085         return mNative;
00086     }
00087 
00092     const char* getNativeType() const
00093     {
00094         return typeid(mNative).name();
00095     }
00096 
00097 protected:
00098     T mNative;
00099 
00100 };
